4084  bool has_skills = false;
4085  profession::StartingSkillList list_skills = you.prof->skills();
4086 
4087  for( const Skill *&elem : skillslist ) {
4088  int level = you.get_skill_level( elem->ident() );
4089 
4090  // Handle skills from professions
4091  if( pool != pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
4092  profession::StartingSkillList::iterator i = list_skills.begin();
4093  while( i != list_skills.end() ) {
4094  if( i->first == elem->ident() ) {
4095  level += i->second;
4096  break;
4097  }
4098  ++i;
4099  }
4100  }
4101 
4102  // Handle skills from hobbies
4103  int leftover_exp = 0;
4104  int exp_to_level = 10000 * ( level + 1 ) * ( level + 1 );
4105  for( const profession *profession : you.hobbies ) {
4106  profession::StartingSkillList hobby_skills = profession->skills();
4107  profession::StartingSkillList::iterator i = hobby_skills.begin();
4108  while( i != hobby_skills.end() ) {
4109  if( i->first == elem->ident() ) {
4110  int skill_exp_bonus = leftover_exp + calculate_cumulative_experience( i->second );
4111  // Calculate Level up to find final level and remaining exp
4112  while( skill_exp_bonus >= exp_to_level ) {
4113  level++;
4114  skill_exp_bonus -= exp_to_level;
4115  exp_to_level = 10000 * ( level + 1 ) * ( level + 1 );
4116  }
4117  leftover_exp = skill_exp_bonus;
4118  break;
4119  }
4120  ++i;
4121  }
4122  }
4123 
4124  if( level > 0 ) {
4125  const int exp_percent = 100 * leftover_exp / exp_to_level;
4126  mvwprintz( w_skills, point( 0, line ), c_light_gray,
4127  elem->name() + ":" );
4128  right_print( w_skills, line, 1, c_light_gray, string_format( "%d(%2d%%)", level, exp_percent ) );
4129  line++;
4130  has_skills = true;
4131  }
4132  }
4133 
4134  if( !has_skills ) {
4135  mvwprintz( w_skills, point( utf8_width( _( "Skills:" ) ) + 1, 0 ), c_light_red, _( "None!" ) );
4136  }
4137  wnoutrefresh( w_skills );
4138  }

4147  mvwprintz( w_bionics, point_zero, COL_HEADER, _( "Bionics:" ) );

4150  } else {

1625  int height = static_cast<int>( iContentHeight );

1634  int prev_page = iCurWorkingPage < 1 ? 2 : iCurWorkingPage - 1;
1635  if( !traits_size[prev_page] )
1636  {
1637  prev_page = prev_page < 1 ? 2 : prev_page - 1;
1638  if( !traits_size[prev_page] ) {
1639  prev_page = prev_page < 1 ? 2 : prev_page - 1;
1640  }
1641  }

1643  int next_page = iCurWorkingPage > 1 ? 0 : iCurWorkingPage + 1;
1644  if( !traits_size[next_page] )
1645  {
1646  next_page = next_page > 1 ? 0 : next_page + 1;
1647  if( !traits_size[next_page] ) {
1648  next_page = next_page > 1 ? 0 : next_page + 1;
1649  }
1650  }
1651 
1652  return invert_direction ? prev_page : next_page;
1653  };

1813  if( screen_reader_mode ) {

1817  * changed by shifting the text slightly.

1830  if( !current.trait->variants.empty() && !u.has_trait_variant( current ) ) {
1831  cur_trait_notes = _( "a different variant of this trait is active" );
1832  } else {

1835  }

1839  }

1842  } else {

1860  details.draw( COL_TR_NEUT );

1866  const size_t size = vStartingTraits[i].size();
1867  sorted_traits[i].clear();
1868  for( size_t j = 0; j < size; j++ ) {
1869  sorted_traits[i].emplace_back( &vStartingTraits[i][j] );
1870  }

1876  traits.begin(),

1894  std::stable_sort( sorted_traits[0].begin(), sorted_traits[0].end(), traits_sorter );
1895  std::stable_sort( sorted_traits[1].begin(), sorted_traits[1].end(), traits_sorter );

1903  if( sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage].empty() ) {
1904  iCurWorkingPage = 0;
1905  if( !sorted_traits[0].empty() ) {
1906  iCurWorkingPage = 0;

1920  std::array< int, 3> cur_sb_pos = iStartPos;

1940  || details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
1941  || navigate_ui_list( action, iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage], 10,
1942  traits_size[iCurWorkingPage], true ) ) {
1943  // No additional action required
1944  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1945  int inc_type = 0;
1946  const trait_id cur_trait = sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage][iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage]]->trait;
1947  const std::string variant = sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage][iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage]]->variant;
1948  const mutation_branch &mdata = cur_trait.obj();
1949 
1950  // Look through the profession bionics, and see if any of them conflict with this trait
1951  std::vector<bionic_id> cbms_blocking_trait = bionics_cancelling_trait( u.prof->CBMs(), cur_trait );
1952  const std::unordered_set<trait_id> conflicting_traits = u.get_conflicting_traits( cur_trait );
1953 
1954  if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1955 
1956  inc_type = -1;
1957 
1958  if( get_scenario()->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1959  inc_type = 0;
1960  popup( _( "Your scenario of %s prevents you from removing this trait." ),
1961  get_scenario()->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1962  } else if( u.prof->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1963  inc_type = 0;
1964  popup( _( "Your profession of %s prevents you from removing this trait." ),
1965  u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1966  }
1967  for( const profession *hobbies : u.hobbies ) {
1968  if( hobbies->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1969  inc_type = 0;
1970  popup( _( "Your background of %s prevents you from removing this trait." ),
1971  hobbies->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1972  }
1973  }
1974  // Switch variant
1975  if( !u.has_trait_variant( trait_and_var( cur_trait, variant ) ) ) {
1976  u.set_mut_variant( cur_trait, cur_trait->variant( variant ) );
1977  inc_type = 0;
1978  details_recalc = true;
1979  }
1980  } else if( !conflicting_traits.empty() ) {
1981  std::vector<std::string> conflict_names;
1982  conflict_names.reserve( conflicting_traits.size() );
1983  for( const trait_id &trait : conflicting_traits ) {
1984  conflict_names.emplace_back( u.mutation_name( trait ) );
1985  }
1986  popup( _( "You already picked some conflicting traits: %s." ),
1987  enumerate_as_string( conflict_names ) );
1988  } else if( get_scenario()->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1989  popup( _( "The scenario you picked prevents you from taking this trait!" ) );
1990  } else if( u.prof->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1991  popup( _( "Your profession of %s prevents you from taking this trait." ),
1992  u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1993  } else if( !cbms_blocking_trait.empty() ) {
1994  // Grab a list of the names of the bionics that block this trait
1995  // So that the player know what is preventing them from taking it
1996  std::vector<std::string> conflict_names;
1997  conflict_names.reserve( cbms_blocking_trait.size() );
1998  for( const bionic_id &conflict : cbms_blocking_trait ) {
1999  conflict_names.emplace_back( conflict->name.translated() );
2000  }
2001  popup( _( "The following bionics prevent you from taking this trait: %s." ),
2002  enumerate_as_string( conflict_names ) );
2003  } else if( iCurWorkingPage == 0 && num_good + mdata.points >
2004  max_trait_points && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2005  popup( n_gettext( "Sorry, but you can only take %d point of advantages.",
2006  "Sorry, but you can only take %d points of advantages.", max_trait_points ),
2007  max_trait_points );
2008 
2009  } else if( iCurWorkingPage != 0 && num_bad + mdata.points <
2010  -max_trait_points && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2011  popup( n_gettext( "Sorry, but you can only take %d point of disadvantages.",
2012  "Sorry, but you can only take %d points of disadvantages.", max_trait_points ),
2013  max_trait_points );
2014 
2015  } else {
2016  inc_type = 1;
2017  }
2018 
2019  //inc_type is either -1 or 1, so we can just multiply by it to invert
2020  if( inc_type != 0 ) {
2021  details_recalc = true;
2022  u.toggle_trait_deps( cur_trait, variant );
2023  if( iCurWorkingPage == 0 ) {
2024  num_good += mdata.points * inc_type;
2025  } else {
2026  num_bad += mdata.points * inc_type;
2027  }
2028  }
2029  } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
2030  traits_sorter.sort_by_points = !traits_sorter.sort_by_points;
2031  recalc_traits = true;
2032  } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
2033  string_input_popup()
2034  .title( _( "Search:" ) )
2035  .width( 10 )
2036  .description( _( "Search by trait name." ) )
2037  .edit( filterstring );
2038  recalc_traits = true;
2039  } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
2040  if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
2041  filterstring.clear();
2042  recalc_traits = true;
2043  }
2044  }
2045  if( iCurWorkingPage != iPrevWorkingPage || iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage] != iPrevLine ) {
2046  details_recalc = true;
2047  }
2048  } while( true );
2049 }
